pwdRoot.loadingTxt:
Creating temporary certificate and setting up HTTPS.
Please wait...
pwdRoot.secConTxt: Secure configuration of the root password via HTTPS requires a certificate which will be created automatically.
pwdRoot.infoTxt:
The password for the pre-configured administrator root must be changed before the product can be used.

If the password for root is lost, the product must be reset to the factory default settings, by pressing the button located in the product's casing. Please see the user documentation for more information.
pwdRoot.ciphWrn: NOTE: You are using a firmware which supports increased user password security. Please refer to the online documentation for important considerations of possible compatibility problems between older firmware releases.
pwdRoot.onvifTxt:
ONVIF will be disabled.
To enable ONVIF go to Setup > System Options > Security > ONVIF
